title: Nelson Peltz's Trian Fund takes $2.5 billion stake in GE
text:
Published By: Reuters - Business - Today 
(Reuters) - Nelson Peltz's Trian Fund Management said it has bought $2.5 billion in General Electric shares since May, making it one of the ...
